text:
This online tool is meant to be used by a health care provider. For more information on breast cancer risk, call 1-800-4-CANCER.",CancerGov,Breast Cancer
How to prevent Breast Cancer ?,The use of certain medicines and other factors decrease the risk of breast cancer. Anything that decreases your chance of getting a disease is called a protective factor.    Protective factors for breast cancer include the following:            - Taking any of the following:                  -  Estrogen-only horm
